## Client.inspectPolicies() method

Inspect policies in the store.

**Signature:**

```typescript
inspectPolicies(request?: InspectPoliciesRequest, options?: RequestOptions): Promise<InspectPoliciesResponse>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>

</td><td>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[RequestOptions](./core.requestoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[InspectPoliciesResponse](./core.inspectpoliciesresponse.md)<!-- -->&gt;

## Remarks

Requires

- the client to be configured with [Options.adminCredentials](./core.options.admincredentials.md)<!-- -->; and

- the Cerbos policy decision point server to be at least v0.35 and configured with the [admin API](https://docs.cerbos.dev/cerbos/latest/api/admin_api) enabled.

## Example


```typescript
const { policies } = await cerbos.inspectPolicies();
```
